org.hibernate.envers.boot

Interface AuditService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable, Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AuditServiceImplementor

    public interface AuditService
extends Service
    Service contract for auditing services provided by Envers.
    Since:
    6.0
